about_the_game:
Survivors Of The Zombie World is a 3D pixel-style zombie survival game. Survivors fight in a world full of zombies, looking for food, ammunition, medicine and other supplies on the map and trying to survive.

◆ Current Features◆

----3D pixel survival shooting game.
----Story mode: Contains 40+ levels, you can clear the zombies to pass the level, you need to escape to the destination, you need to collect some items. Various small easter eggs are waiting for you to discover.

----Survival mode: You need to survive in various terrains. Time is long, and you need to find something to eat when you are hungry. If you run out of ammunition, you need to find supplies. It is too dark at night, you have to turn on the flashlight, or hide in a safe corner.

----Defense mode: A large wave of zombies rush into the base, and you must pick up weapons to protect the last piece of land. There are electric towers around the door, which can protect you, but you must pay attention to maintenance and pick up supplies in time. Zombies are getting stronger and stronger, I wish you good luck!
----Temporarily supports LAN online mode, and survive with your friends.
----More than 17 survivors can be chosen, and they have their own characteristics.
detailed_description:
About us

Hello everyone, I am Kt, the producer of "Survivors of Zombie World" (hereinafter referred to as "Survivors"). I am very excited to finally meet you on Steam. Survivors, as my first game in entrepreneurship, has been online on mobile terminals for some time. Looking back on these days, the development team has expanded from 2 people to more than 10 people, and has experienced twists and turns and the COVID-19 pandemic; during this period, we have done many other projects for the survival of the team; we have developed survivors intermittently in the middle, and this year there are only 1 programmer partner and Tata; the fewer people have made us more focused on continuing the development of survivors, and we have also made the PC version after many hardships this time. I hope everyone likes it.

The PC version will be released soon, and based on this version, the complete appearance of the Gunner plan will be gradually realized through continuous iteration. The update content of the PC version will be completely different from the mobile version. I hope everyone will join the game, give us suggestions, and improve the game. Thank you everyone! !
